survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how workplace noise levels affect employee productivity and satisfaction, helping organizations design better office environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you find workplace noise distracting?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button display.
